did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Travis C. McDonald Papers, 1991-2023

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Travis C. McDonald papers, 1991-2023. Accession 53913. Personal papers collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Travis C. McDonald is the Director of Architectural Restoration at Thomas Jefferson's Poplar Forest in Bedford County, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Papers, 1991-2023, of Travis C. McDonald, Director of Architectural Restoration at Thomas Jefferson's Poplar Forest, which is located in Bedford County, Virginia. Records consist of materials published by the Corporation for Jefferson's Poplar Forest, including material written by McDonald; articles written about Poplar Forest by McDonald and published in other sources; and articles written about Poplar Forest by other authors. Also contains articles written by McDonald regarding other aspects of historic preservation and other historic preservation sites.
